testsuite.name: Smoke Testing Suite: Log-In Main Functions

testcase.name: Log-in with incomplete data
testcase.summary:
Steps

1: Go to facebook.com/login

2: Introduce correct mail adress 

3: Introduce incomplete password

Expected result: Account icon will be displayed along with "Wrong password message" and other options to log-in

testcase.name: Log-in with non-existent data
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to facebook.com/login

2. Fill address and password boxes with random, inexisting data

3. Try to log-in

Expected result: Receive message "Email introduced is incorrect"

testcase.name: Log-in with correct data (No 2-steps verification)
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to facebook.com/login

2. Fill log-in boxes with correct data

3. Log-in

Expected result: You will enter your account unless you have 2-steps verification activated

testcase.name: Test browser "Go back" button after a succesful log-in
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Succesfully log-in on Facebook

2. In the browser menu, click "Page back"

Expected result: You will be redirected to Facebook Log-in page

testcase.name: Test if .gif comments display successfully
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Upload a .gif document in the comment section on a post in your News Feed

Expected result: The .gif file will be displayed correctly

testcase.name: Test if specific comments are displayed if sorted by most relevant
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to the Comments section in a post on your News feed

2 . Sort by most relevant

Expected results: Most relevant comments will be displayed

testcase.name: Test if specific comments are displayed if sorted by Newest
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to the Comments section in a post on your News feed

2 . Sort by Newest

Expected results: Newest comments will be displayed

testcase.name: Test if specific comments are displayed if sorted by All
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to the Comments section in a post on your News feed

2 . Sort by All

Expected results: All comments will be displayed

testcase.name: Test for notification after commenting on a post and receiving an answer
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Comment on a post that requires an answer

2. Check for notification after receiving an answer

Expected results: Notification will pop-up

testcase.name: Test what happens if you remove deactivated accounts from Friends List
testcase.summary:
1. Go to friends list

2. Remove a Deactivated Account from Friends List

Expected result: Safety message will pop-up

testcase.name: Test if you still have a friend in list after removing him
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Remove a friend from list

2. Check if you still have that friend in list

Expected results: Friend will disappear from list

testcase.name: Test if friends list count is updated accordingly after deleting an exact number of friends
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Remove 5 friends from Friends List

2. Check if Friends Count has updated

Expected results: The count will update precisely

testcase.name: Test if all people having the same name appear in your friends list when you search for a specific n
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Write a single word name which plenty friends in your list have in their displayed names

Expected results: All friends bearing that name will be displayed

testcase.name: Test if you see on news feed posts from a friends marked Favorite & get a notification
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Mark a friend as favourite

2. Verify if you received a notification he posted

3. Verify if his post displays on News Feed

Expected results: You will receive notification & you will also see your friend's post on news feed

testcase.name: Test if search history is updated after last search
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Search something in search bar

2. Refresh page

3. Check if search history is updated after last search

Expected result: Search history is updated

testcase.name: Test if search history still appears after deleting it
testcase.summary:
Steps:

Click Search Bar

Click Edit

Click "Clear searches"

Refresh

Click Search Bar again

Expected result: Nothing to show

testcase.name: Test if relevant suggestions are displayed after searching by keywords
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Search a relevant topic by keywords. Example: Cinematography 

Expected results: Relevant searches are displayed

testcase.name: Test if Facebook functions or sections are displayed when writing their names in the search bar
testcase.summary:
Steps:

Search for "Settings" in Search Bar

Expected Results: Settings Menul will be displayed

testcase.name: Test if relevant people are displayed after keywords
testcase.summary:
Steps: 

1. Search by relevant keywords - name, city, studies

2. Check if displayed searches are relevant

testcase.name: See if the call function in messenger works when you receive a call
testcase.summary:
1. Receive a call on Facebook web application

2. Answer

Expected results: Call works

testcase.name: See if the call function in messenger works when you start a call
testcase.summary:
1. Initiate a call on Facebook web application

2. Wait for answer

Expected results: Call works

testcase.name: See if the "call in progress" status remains after the call ends
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. End a call

2. Check if "call in progress" status remains in chat menu

Expected results: Call in progress status dissappears

testcase.name: See if you receive a notification in the message bar of the web application when you receive a new m
testcase.summary:
1. Receive a message on Facebook web application

2. Check for message notifications

Expected results: Message notification will appear

testcase.name: Test how the web application reacts when you receive many spam messages
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Receive spam messages using a spammer application

Expected results: You won't receive more than 30 messages before the spamming account is blocked

testcase.name: See if you can search for messages in the conversation
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to a loaded conversation

2. Click on user name

3. Click Open in Messenger

4. Search a keyword

testcase.name: Test if scrolling too much will affect scrolling function
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Scroll in a long conversation

2. Check what happens while older messages are loading

Expected results: Scrolling should not be affected  negatively by loading older messages

testcase.name: Test if you can post a 500 words message
testcase.summary:
Steps

1. Send a 500 words long message 

Expected results: Message will be sent

testcase.name: Test if you can post a 1000 words long message
testcase.summary:
Steps

1. Send a 1000 words long message 

Expected results: Message will be sent

testcase.name: Test if you can post a 5000 words message
testcase.summary:
Steps

1. Send a 5000 words long message 

Expected results: Message will be sent

testcase.name: Test if you can look through pictures reel after clicking a picture
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to a chat

2. Click on a picture

3. Use arrows to scroll through pictures

Expected results: Loading won't affect scrolling negatively

testcase.name: Test if you can look through sent pictures in Media menu from chat options
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to a conversation chat

2. Go to Informations

3. Go to Media, files and links

4, Click Media

5. Scroll down

Expected results: Loading older images won't affect the scrolling negatively

testcase.name: Test if searching in chat by keyword will index more than 100-150 keyword entries
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to a conversation where you have used a word more than 150 times

2. Search for that word by keywords

Expected results: All keywords will be displayed, even if there are more than 150 entries of that keyword

testcase.name: Test if you can still search keywords after unarchiving an archived conversation
testcase.summary:
1. Archive a conversation

2. Unarchive that conversation 

3. Search in conversation by keywords

Expected results: Searching feature won't be affected

testcase.name: Test if you receive notifications when someone reacts to your post
testcase.summary:
1. Have another account react on one random post of yours

Expected results: Notification pop-up

testcase.name: Test if you receive notifications when someone comments on one of your posts
testcase.summary:
1. Have another account comment on one random post of yours

Expected results: Notification pop-up

testcase.name: Test if you receive notifications when someone replies to your comment when you post somewhere
testcase.summary:
1. Have another account reply on one random comment of yours

Expected results: Notification pop-up

testcase.name: Test if you receive notifications when someone shares your posts
testcase.summary:
1. Have another account share one random post of yours

Expected results: Notification pop-up

testcase.name: Test the search function to find a contact from the active ones
testcase.summary:
In the right Contacts List bar click search button

Search an active account by name

Expected result: Specifc account will display according to name searched

testcase.name: Test if the sound works for incoming calls after you have deactivated the function
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. In the Active Contacts List go to Settings and turn off incoming calls sound

Expected results: You will not hear a sound when receiving a call

testcase.name: Test if the sound works on messages after you have deactivated the function
testcase.summary:
Steps.

1. in Active Contacts list click settings and activate sound for new messages

Expected results: Audible sound when a new message is received

testcase.name: Test if new messages are still opened after deactivating the function
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. In Active Contacts List go to settings and deactivate "Pop Up new messages"

Expected result: New messages won't pop up

testcase.name: Test if status still active after setting the visibility to hidden
testcase.summary:
In Active Contacts settings set Active Status to OFF

Expected Results: Active status will be hidden from everybody unless selecting exceptions

testsuite.name: Smoke Testing Suite: My Profile Timeline and Posts

testcase.name: Test if you can post a status
testcase.summary:
Steps

1. Post a status on your timeline

Expected results: Status is posted succesfully

testcase.name: Test if the posts you shared appear in your News Feed
testcase.summary:
1. Share a post

Expected result: New post displays on your timeline

testcase.name: Test if your privacy changes on a post
testcase.summary:
1. Post something

2. Change privacy

Expected results: Privacy will be changed accordingly

testcase.name: Test if you receive notifications for reactions to your posts
testcase.summary:
1. Create a post

2. Have another account react on your post

Expected result: You will receive a notification

testcase.name: Test if you receive notification for comments on your posts
testcase.summary:
1. Create a post

2. Have another account comment on your post

Expected result: You will receive a notification

testcase.name: Test if you can change your cover photo's privacy
testcase.summary:
1. Click on your cover photo

2. Click privacy button

Expected result: Privacy button will work

testcase.name: Check if the privacy settings for Studies section are working
testcase.summary:
1. Go to About tab on your profile

2. Change privacy settings on mentioned section

Expected results: Settings should change accordingly

testcase.name: Check if the privacy settings for Current Location are working
testcase.summary:
1. Go to About tab on your profile

2. Change privacy settings on mentioned section

Expected results: Settings should change accordingly

testcase.name: Check if the privacy settings for Birth Location are working
testcase.summary:
1. Go to About tab on your profile

2. Change privacy settings on mentioned section

Expected results: Settings should change accordingly

testcase.name: Check if the privacy settings for Relationship status are working
testcase.summary:
1. Go to About tab on your profile

2. Change privacy settings on mentioned section

Expected results: Settings should change accordingly

testcase.name: Check if the privacy settings for the Phone number are working
testcase.summary:
1. Go to About tab on your profile

2. Change privacy settings on mentioned section

Expected results: Settings should change accordingly

testcase.name: Test the UI when you post new pictures
Test the Album section UI
Test the UI when you want to add tag to a photo
Test the UI when you want to remove the tag from photos
Test the UI when you post a new video
Test the UI when you tag a new video
Test the UI when you edit a new video
Test browser "Go back" button after an unsuccesful log-in
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Attempt to log-in with incorrect data

2. CLick "Go back" in browser menu

Expected results: You will be redirected to the previous page where your inccorect data is still introduced, so you can easily edit it

testcase.name: Volume test: Spam comment section with data
testcase.summary:
Steps:

1. Go to a post on News Feed

2. Using a spam application, load the comment section with the message "Hello world!"

Expected result: The meesages will be deleted before being posted and message "You can't comment at this time" will be received

testcase.name: User Interface Test: How easy it is to access Memories
testcase.summary:
Test if you can easily access Memories section on Facebook by:

News Feed

Search Bar

testcase.name: Improvement: Chat
testcase.summary: Text message menu should be displayed at the end of message box instead of middle of message box in order to save scrolling.
